{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "I'll get this done as soon as possible. Then I'll be outta your hair!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I've been coming here way too often recently.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Ahhhhh! It's about to blow!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Hit the deck!', 4: '1'}
{2: "What's going on?", 3: '11', 4: 'Go take a look!', 5: '12'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "They aren't botching the turret again, are they?!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Thanks, Captain Obvious!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory30.jpg'}
{3: '(Whirling noise) â€” Turret has resumed normal operation.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Gotta hand it to the commandant and Karenina for saving me. If the turret blasted a hole in the base's wall, we would've been goners.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Yeah, good thing the commandant and Karenina arrived in the nick of time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina did most of the work.', 3: '22'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Thanks for your support, Karenina.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: '...No need... No need... to thank me...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'It was nothing!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Anyway! I'll handle the rest from here...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Karenina is just as bold and brazen on the battlefield.', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Nod)', 3: '31', 4: 'Is this how the engineering force gets the job done?', 5: '33'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Alright... Enough chit-chat!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "You could say that. After all, we're around them all the time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Flattery won't make me step on the gas! Quit distracting me from my work!", 4: '1'}
